intro: I wanted a way to restore vision, when my helmet fogged up, with out taking it off. I glued magnets to two pices of sponge cloth and put them together, with the visor in between. Now I can clean the inside with out by moving the cloth over the outside.Adhesion and thickness are not optimal yet, but it works. This is the link to the helmet thing: https://www.instructables.com/Space-Suit-Inspired-Droplet-Hood/
